PageTitle: reset e1 counters controller cpos e1
FuncDef: The reset e1 counters controller cpos e1 command clears error packets statistics and alarm information statistics on a CPOS interface's E1 channels.
CLIs: reset e1 counters controller cpos <controller-number> [ e1 <e1-number> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of CPOS interface.
-

Specifies the number of an E1 channel on a CPOS interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 63.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset e1 counters controller cpos 1/0/0 e1 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to collect statistics on alarms and error packets in a future specified period, run this command to clear the existing statistics on alarms and error packets.
Precautions
Statistics cleared cannot be restored. Exercise cautions before running this command.
